items.title: Why Caterpillar Stock Zoomed Nearly 10% Higher on Wednesday
items.description: In times of volatility, investors often find comfort in a company maintaining a steady-as-we-go policy.  Caterpillar's consistency came from its dividend policy.  Such a move is a positive signal to investors that the company will do well enough to at least keep the dividend level.

items.title: Jim Cramer’s Dilemma: Should Investors Wait or Buy the Dip in Caterpillar (CAT)?
items.description: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Warns of a 36% Market Drop & Reviews These 9 Key Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) stands against other stocks Jim Cramer discusses. In his appearance on CNBC’s Squawk on the Street on Monday, Jim Cramer […]
